ejection_event.description: [string]Animation event that triggers the casing ejection. If none is specified it happens on fire.

ejection_node.description: [string]Node on the weapon to play the ejection port effect.

casing_node.description: [string]Nodes on the weapon to play the casing effect. Cycles through them if there is more than one.

link_node.description: [string]Node on the weapon to play the link effect.

casing_impact_type.description: Surface impact type to use for effects on shellcasing bounces.

casing_audio_event.description: [string]If set, use this audio event instead of the default for the impact type.
